divs: Sighting Detailswhen i was a chil i awoke to numerous small lights foating through the air in myroom from one window and out the other. the object continued passing through theroom it was about 6 feet wide and looked like thousands of little lightsfloating through the air and they made a noise like thousands of small bells.after watching the objest for a few seconds it appeard to have cought mewatching it and then it increased speed and sped through the room until i sawthe tail end of it pass. while it was passing through i now i was not dreamingand i was not scared either. what is wierd is that at that age i was scared ofeverything. up to this day i have never told anyone because they would prbablythink i was crazy.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Somerton
There were no other sightings in Somerton on or around November 30th 1972
Summary: unexplained sighting when i was a child
